item.title: PFT #99 - Personal Finance Tip of the Week: The Annual Escrow Analysis
item.description: For most owners, when they purchase their homes, the monthly mortgage payment is a fixed amount for 30-years and sometimes 15, people still become accustomed to a standard payment each month. On top of the mortgage payment is an escrow account... Feed: https://www.spreaker.com/show/5501411/episodes/feed
